name: God Does Not Play With Dice
name_original: God Does Not Play With Dice
description:
Instructions

Arrows/WASD move; Space/Mouse shoot.

The face of the die that is up defines how it will behave. The higher the number, the more powerful the attack.

Shoot from wise positions to roll the dice in your favor.

Dice moves BasicFires a shot every 4 seconds. (1 in higher difficulties).⚀ - OneHeals the player by 3 points.
⚁ - TwoGets weak for a short period, recieving 3x damage.⚂ - ThreeShoots 10 fast bullets in player's direction.⚃ - FourShoots 10 waves of shots in every direction.⚄ - FiveThrows a single laser beam while shoots fast bullets.⚅ - SixThrows 4 laser beams at the same time. Info & Credits

Game design, development, UI art: Lfzinho (Me :3)
Spaceship model - Kenney
Music - Ville Nousiainen 
Space Background - Deep Fold

This Game was made for GMTK Game Jam, with the theme "Roll the Dice".

Hey, I have a pretty cool puzzle/satisfying indie game on Steam. If you like my small games and want to support these crazy ideas, I definitely recommend you to check it out: Explosion™.
